Package Game.Model

Class BoardState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Game.Model.BoardState
  • public class BoardState
extends java.util.Observable
    This class tracks the state of a grid for a Battleship player, validates guesses, and also tracks what boats have or can be placed on the board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoardState​(boolean isPlayer)
      Constructs a fresh state of the Battleship game and initializes an empty grid

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the grid to its default dimension and re-initializes the state

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard()
        Clears the board of all ships

      • validateGuess

        public boolean validateGuess​(int x,
                             int y)
        Validates a guess on the game board by checking if the grid contains a ship or not
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the guess on the grid
        y - Y coordinate of the guess on the grid
        Returns:
        Returns true if the guess is valid, false if its not

      • placeShipOnBoard

        public boolean placeShipOnBoard​(int row,
                                int column,
                                int boatSize,
                                boolean isHorizontal)
        Places a boat of a given ship size at the provided coordinates
        Parameters:
        row - Row that the boat begins
        column - Column that the boat begins
        boatSize - Size of the boat to be created
        isHorizontal - True if the boat is horizontal, false if it is vertical
        Returns:
        True if the boat has been placed, false the location is invalid and it cannot be placed

      • randomizeShipLocations

        public void randomizeShipLocations()
        Places a varying number of ships in random locations on the board. Number of ships placed changes on grid size.

      • numberOfBoatSizesRemaining

        public int numberOfBoatSizesRemaining​(int boatSize)
        Checks how many boats of size N are remaining and can still be placed on the board
        Parameters:
        boatSize - Size of boat to be checked
        Returns:
        Number of boats of boatSize remaining

      • populateBoatSizeOptions

        public void populateBoatSizeOptions()
        Populates the list of unique boat sizes that may be placed on the board

      • getBoatSizeOptions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getBoatSizeOptions()
        Returns list of unique boat sizes that may be placed on the board
        Returns:
        List of unique boat sizes that may be placed on the board

      • isDesignBoatsEmpty

        public boolean isDesignBoatsEmpty()
        Checks if there are any boats that can still be placed on the game board
        Returns:
        True if all boats have been placed, false if there are some remaining

      • isPlayer

        public boolean isPlayer()
        Checks if board belongs to player or not
        Returns:
        True if board state belongs to player, false otherwise

      • getGridDimension

        public int getGridDimension()
        Gets the dimension of one side of the game board
        Returns:
        Dimension of one side of the game board

      • resizeGrid

        public void resizeGrid​(int newGridDimension)
        Resizes the grid to a new dimension, resets the state of the grid, and repopulates design boat list
        Parameters:
        newGridDimension - New dimension of the board

      • getGridSquare

        public GridSquare getGridSquare​(int x,
                                int y)
        Returns the grid square at location x,y
        Parameters:

        Returns:
